extendedInfo.description: Team Red Cross wants you! Join Team Red Cross to help provide care and comfort to your local community  when the unthinkable occurs.Each year, more than one million Americans  volunteer with the Red Cross. These volunteers  assist victims of fires, floods, storms, and other disasters. The more severe the disaster, the more volunteers we need--sometimes at a momentâs notice. Everyone has something special to offer...including you. Team Red Cross is looking for people with various backgrounds, talents, and skill levels. Make a difference, support your community and join Team Red Cross!Features:â¢ Be available to help with disaster assessment, feeding, bulk distribution, in a shelter or other important work to help those in need.â¢ Get âbriefedâ on volunteer jobs via simple steps, short videos and quizzesâbefore you ever show up to help.  â¢ Receive and respond to notifications for volunteer jobs based on your location  â¢ Share volunteer opportunities with friends in your social network â¢ Earn digital âbadgesâ for a variety of activities (accepting a job, completing a job, sharing the app, recruiting volunteers, etc.)and share them with your social network!â¢ Get connected with other Team Red Cross members and view their Red Cross activitiesâ¢ Send valuable recovery information to those who need it right from the app

reviews.title: Why the music?
reviews.comment: Make the music stop when it launches. App has crashed both times I tried to open it.
reviews.author: Frank Stafford

reviews.title: Does not open.  Update.
reviews.comment: The app opens but only after tapping the blank screen 2 or 3 times.
reviews.author: Ed Rau

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: With the update I did today it opens great job
reviews.author: Jen Taylor

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: I\'m unable to log into VC using the same username-password I use on my computer (not fb login)
reviews.author: Jorge Mora

reviews.title: The app crashes
reviews.comment: Not taking my login details. ..I\'m using the same login details I used on my computer.
reviews.author: sudheer kumar chinta

reviews.title: Impeccable design and great idea
reviews.comment: No crashes for me on the Nexus 4 running Android 4.3. The design is amazing - whoever designed it should be proud. Hamburger pullout nav, Gmail-style pull to refresh, HOLOYOLO everywhere. It\'s beautiful.  1 star docked for giving achievements immediately after clicking on Accept Mission, and the following screen being a simple Webview. Eww.
reviews.author: Artem Russakovskii

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: No crashes so far on the Nexus 4. The main reason I\'m giving 5 stars is for the design. It\'s great to see big organizations making well designed android apps!
reviews.author: Navjot Batra

reviews.title: Makes Volunteering Quick and Easy during Disaster
reviews.comment: I was surpised how simple it was to complete the training. There were videos and text, followed by a quiz to make sure you retained the info. You don\'t want a disaster but hope I can be notified in case of emergency soon so I can help!
reviews.author: Evan Derr

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: This app keeps crashing and closing before I can do anything
reviews.author: Christel Kincaid

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is really freaking awesome. HUGE props to your dev team. I have a ton of information available and actually enjoy learning it. Protips: make that icon follow the Android guidelines, add Google+ login, and use something other than a webview for your forms. ;)
reviews.author: Cassidy James

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Satisfactory and nice layout .. Clearly someone was listening to the HOLO standards.. Gonna start rackin\' up dem cheevos
reviews.author: Joe Bisbee

reviews.comment: So far, so good.... it loaded OK.
reviews.author: Edward Bosler
